news_header: Salwan Momika, known for burning Qurans, was reportedly shot dead in Södertälje, but police have not confirmed his identity.
news_text: Salwan Momika, an Iraqi man infamous for burning several Qurans in Sweden, was shot dead in an apartment in Södertälje on Wednesday night. While media reports suggest he was the victim, police have not confirmed his identity or whether he was broadcasting live on TikTok during the incident. The Danish police have also been informed, and the Swedish security police are involved in the investigation. The area around the crime scene has been isolated, and one person has been questioned, but no arrests have been confirmed. Momika had received a temporary residence permit in Sweden and faced potential danger if he returned to Iraq. He and another man were previously accused of incitement related to their Quran burnings.
